card_text: "Infernoid" monsters you control gain 100 ATK for each of your banished "Infernoid" monsters. If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are Fiend monsters: You can activate 1 of these effects;$N●Add 1 of your banished "Infernoid" monsters to your hand.$N●Special Summon 1 "Infernoid" monster from your hand, ignoring its Summoning conditions.$NYou can only use this effect of "Void Breach" once per turn.
